document.full_text: one of her twin girls in one arm and a glass of champagne in the other hand, roger federer's wife mirka looked far from dejected after her husband once again came up short against rafa nadal in a french open final on sunday.
document.title: rafa and roger are back in the game, says federer
lines_and_colors: one of her twin girls in one arm and a glass of champagne in the other hand, roger federer's wife mirka looked far from dejected after her husband once again came up short against rafa nadal in a french open final on sunday.
